hero.title: Discover Your Academic Path with
hero.subtitle: Our AI-powered platform helps you understand your strengths, explore suitable academic paths, and make informed decisions about your future studies.

survey.title: 2025 JUPAS Results Survey
survey.description: In light of the unexpected fluctuations in the 2025 Joint University Programmes Admissions System (JUPAS) results, we invite you to share the admission scores of your offered programme via this Google Form. All submitted data will be anonymized and publicly shared as a reference for future applicants. Your contribution will foster transparency and support informed academic planning within the education community.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: EDVise is dedicated to helping students discover their academic potential, make informed educational decisions, and plan for successful futures.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become Hong Kong's leading AI-driven academic counseling platform, providing personalized educational guidance for every student.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are a professional team of education experts, AI researchers, and software developers committed to providing the best academic counseling services for students.

googleForm.title: JUPASurvey
googleForm.description: We value your feedback! Please take a moment to share your thoughts and suggestions with us.
googleForm.footer: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback.

privacy.title: Privacy Statement
privacy.consent: By creating an account, you agree to our privacy policy and consent to the collection, processing, and analysis of your personal data for educational purposes.
privacy.details: This includes your academic information, preferences, and usage data to provide personalized educational guidance and improve our services.
privacy.rights: Under Hong Kong's Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance (Cap. 486), you have the right to access, correct, and request deletion of your personal data.
privacy.contact: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact us at info4edvise@gmail.com.
privacy.agreeToTerms: I agree to the privacy statement and terms of service.
privacy.warning: You must agree to the privacy statement to continue with registration.

help.title: Help Centre
help.messageSent: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
help.messageError: Failed to send message. Please try again later.

whatIsEdvise.question: What is EDVise?
whatIsEdvise.answer: EDVise is an AI-powered educational guidance platform designed to help secondary school pupils discover their strengths, explore suitable academic paths, and make informed decisions about their future studies. Our platform combines personality assessment, ability testing, and AI counselling to provide personalised recommendations.

howDoesAbilityTestWork.question: How does the ability test work?
howDoesAbilityTestWork.answer: Our ability test evaluates six key dimensions: Numerical Reasoning, Logical Reasoning, Graphical Reasoning, Verbal Reasoning, Memory, and Creativity. The test consists of various interactive questions and tasks designed to measure your natural abilities in these areas. The results help us understand your strengths and suggest suitable academic paths.

whoIsEddy.question: Who is Eddy?
whoIsEddy.answer: Eddy is our AI counsellor who can help you understand your test results, explore different academic options, and provide personalised advice. You can chat with Eddy about your abilities, interests, and future plans to get tailored recommendations and guidance.

howAccurateAreRecommendations.question: How accurate are the recommendations?
howAccurateAreRecommendations.answer: Our recommendations are based on a combination of your ability test results, academic performance, and personal interests. While we strive to provide accurate and helpful suggestions, these should be considered as guidance rather than definitive answers. We encourage you to discuss the recommendations with teachers, counsellors, and family members.

whatInformationDoINeed.question: What information do I need to provide?
whatInformationDoINeed.answer: To get the most accurate recommendations, you'll need to complete the ability test and provide some basic information about your academic background and interests. All personal information is kept confidential and used solely to improve your experience on the platform.

howCanIInterpretScores.question: How can I interpret my ability scores?
howCanIInterpretScores.answer: Each ability is scored on a scale of 1 to 5, where 1 indicates basic proficiency and 5 indicates exceptional ability. These scores are relative and should be considered in combination with other factors. Higher scores in certain areas may indicate natural strengths that could be valuable in specific academic fields.

canIRetakeTest.question: Can I retake the ability test?
canIRetakeTest.answer: Yes, you can retake the ability test, but we recommend waiting at least 3 months between attempts to ensure more accurate results. Your previous scores will be saved for comparison, and you can track your progress over time.

howDoIUseTrajectory.question: How do I use the trajectory feature?
howDoIUseTrajectory.answer: The trajectory feature helps you visualise and plan your academic journey. You can add important events, achievements, and goals to create a timeline of your educational path. This can help you stay organised and motivated as you work towards your academic objectives.

isMyDataSecure.question: Is my data secure?
isMyDataSecure.answer: Yes, we take data security very seriously. All your personal information and test results are encrypted and stored securely. We comply with relevant data protection regulations and will never share your information with third parties without your explicit consent.

howCanIGetSupport.question: How can I get additional support?
howCanIGetSupport.answer: If you need additional support, you can reach out to our support team through the contact form. We also recommend discussing your results and plans with your school counsellors, teachers, and family members who can provide valuable insights and guidance.

presentation.comprehensiveReflectiveExperience: We offer a comprehensive reflective experience, enhanced by retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) and an interactable non-relational database. We acknowledge the multiplicity of life narratives by helping students articulate the multiple signficances of each life event, with both template structures and the freedom to construct.
